item.title: When an app asks for permissions, it should have a "feed fake data" option
item.description: - When an app asks for permissions, users should have the option to provide fake data instead of granting full access.

item.title: Software engineers hate code
item.description: - Software engineers often dislike working with code, especially code written by others.

item.title: Langchain Is Pointless
item.description: - Langchain is a popular but poorly designed library for working with language models.

item.title: I stopped buying new laptops (2020)
item.description: - The author explains why they stopped buying new laptops and instead switched to using a second-hand 2006 machine that cost them significantly less money.

item.title: Learn electronics by practice
item.description: - This post titled 'Learn electronics by practice' is for people who are interested in learning about electronics through hands-on practice.

item.title: PdfGptIndexer: Indexing & searching PDF text data using GPT-2 & FAISS
item.description: - PdfGptIndexer is a tool that helps you quickly find and search information in PDF documents using advanced AI models.

item.title: The Horror Game of the Year Is a Doom II Mod
item.description: - MyHouse.wad, a Doom II mod, is being hailed as the best horror game of the year by its cult following.

item.title: Why use Pascal?
item.description: - Pascal is a modern, readable, and fast programming language that can be used to develop maintainable applications.

item.title: Scams upon scams: The data-driven advertising grift
item.description: - Digital advertising is filled with scams and deceptive practices, with multiple layers of deceit stacked on top of each other.
